member.name: WICPngBkgdProperties
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) background (bKGD) chunk metadata properties.

summary.para: Indicates the background color. There are three possible types, depending on the image's pixel format.
Specifies the index of the background color in an image with an indexed pixel format.
Specifies the background color in a grayscale image.
Specifies the background color in an RGB image as three USHORT values: {0xRRRR, 0xGGGG, 0xBBBB}.
